text: Beloved () is a 1965 Soviet romance film directed by Richard Viktorov."От нее шел свет". Какой запомнят народную артистку Александру НазаровуГолос голливудских персонажей и звезда «Ералаша». Какой запомнят Александру НазаровуВ Москве умерла актриса Александра Назарова == Plot == The film tells about a girl named Ira, who planned to go to college, but after meeting the builder she decided that she would work at a construction site, where she began to conflict with colleagues who did not like her personal qualities.Любимая == Cast == * Aleksandra Nazarova as Ira Yegorova * Vitali Solomin as Volodya Levadov * Igor Dobrolyubov as Rostik * Svetlana Druzhinina as Sofya * Vyacheslav Brovkin as Dementiy Pavlovich Blyakhin (as V. Brovkin) * Boris Platonov as Ivan Yegorovich * Yelena Maksimova as Nina Petrovna * Aleksey Baranovsky as Bit-Part * Anna Dubrovina as Ksyusha * Roman Filippov as LoaderЛюбимая (1965) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1965 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet romance films Category:Soviet films Category:1960s romance films Category:Soviet black-and-white films
title: Beloved (1965 film)
